name: Gem Kin Connection
description:
This game was the first game I ever made. I'm finally releasing it 3 years later because I realize how much heart and soul I put into the story and wanted to share with those who like these type of story driven games. The characters reflect my real life nieces and nephews who helped me choose their visuals and what type of magic they possessed! 

CREDITS:

Developer - baz

IMPORTANT NOTE: 

There are some bugs and glitches that can occur. Please SAVE whenever you can and note that this is the final version as I do not use the engine anymore.
